inclusion.criterion: Moderate to severe chronic pain and/or fatigue
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to read, speak, and understand English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe cognitive impairment defined as two or more errors on the Six-Item Screener
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Psychiatric condition or symptoms that would interfere with participation
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Currently receiving psychological treatment for pain and/or fatigue
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Has participated in any previous or current research study conducted by investigators in the Department of Rehabilitation Medicine that involved pain or fatigue management via psychological treatments
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of seizure activity and is currently receiving psychological treatment for pain and/or fatigue, making them likely ineligible for this trial.
